description:
Enable Startup is a one-stop IT solution provider based in Da Nang, Vietnam. Founded in 2016 on genuine passion for technologies, we have since then embarked relentlessly on more than 50 projects with 30 global businesses of all shapes and sizes across 11 countries. Those challenging yet rewarding endeavors have honed our technical skills to fulfill world-class standards, while complementing our delivery capacities with solid industrial know-hows and best practices.

Currently, under one roof, we pool talents with a broad spectrum of expertises: enterprise & startup consultants, data scientists, software engineers, designers and marketers.

We provide startups and enterprises with tailor-made solutions that cover the gamut:

- Website Development
- Mobile App Development
- Dedicated Development Teams
- UI & UX Design
- Data Analytics
- IoT Development
- Blockchain Development
- Custom Product Development

Get in touch with us at: hello@enablestartup.com

portfolios.des: As BioLogic Technik's key IoT partner, we collaborated with them to come up with an entire IoT ecosystem, consisting of: BIOMECHANICAL WEARABLE, BIOPACER SMARTAPP:, ELDERLY CARE - BED-EXIT FALL PREVENTION SYSTEM, BIOPACER MOBILE APP. A coaching platform targeting the elderly and people with fitness issues as a whole. The app offers rich community features (social, trending, infotainment), virtual coaching resources with a high level of personalization, facilitating users to practice exercise at their own pace.

description:

description:

description:

location: Vietnam, Hồ Chí Minh, Ho Chi Minh City
description:
YOONG is an end-to-end software solution company that specializes in developing custom softwares, friendly websites, highly-usable web apps and also mobile apps for Android, iOS.

We’re proud to be the strategic partner with more than 330+ innovative entrepreneurs, from early stage startups to internationally recognized enterprises.

Our dear clients just keep their focus on the main business objectives while our expert team takes care of all the rest. Together we create end-to-end digital solutions in 6 steps:

1. Idea Gathering
2. Business Strategy
3. UX/UI Design & Technical Architect
4. Web and Mobile App Development & Testing
5. Launching
6. Maintenance & Support

We always strive hard for the best quality, respect the deadline, fit the budget, and match the needs.

Let's get in touch to talk about your creative ideas!

portfolios.des: PGworks.vn was born to shorten recruitment time and open job opportunities in the retail industry with specific jobs such as PG, PB, sales consultants, merchandiser, field sales, cashier...

Desiring to provide all-in-one utility services, TM Group pursues the philosophy of building a closed ecosystem providing flight booking, airport transfers, accommodation service with membership point system.

Established in the 90s in Yagon, Myanmar, UMG Motor is known as the exclusive assembly and distribution partner of French high-end scooters in Vietnam. With years of experience in the motorcycle industry, UMG has decided to launch scooter models, to bring new standards for users.

MyU is an online learning marketplace, where students can take courses in everything from programming to yoga or photography and much, much more. Each of our courses is taught by an expert instructor, available on-demand, so students can learn at their own pace, on their own time, and on any device.

Careplus provide healthcare service with utilities and ease for patients right at their home or workplace. CarePlus clinic first opened in Viet Nam in 2015 and the second in 2016. CarePlus Clinic was fully owned by CityClinic Asia Investments Ple, Ltd.
With valuable experience in outdoor, camping accessory manufacturing, Madfox confidently provide best products for your wonderful trip.

FanFan is the leading trekking, camping outdoor equipment chain stores. FanFan’s warehouse management, sales management, and order management system integrated with website to create comprehensive structure which is total user friendly for both administrators and clients.

Onecham is a home and neighborhood site for buyers and renters to find homes and neighborhoods across the Vietnam through recommendations, local insights, and map overlays that offer details on commute, reported crime, schools, and nearby businesses.

Inspection Tool is an Web and Mobile Application which was used to manage system's progress and quality, also to track and control all problems occuring to every orders without any problems with the geographical problems of all over the world.

Hoozing which is an online marketplace for searching and renting long-term accommodations, aims at making house renting hassle-free, trustful, time saving, and simply accessible for everyone with any device.

Vietnam HR Summit is the nationally largest gathering of HR professionals and Business leaders in Vietnam. Vietnam HR Summit merged comprehensive online payment gateway, accept almost domestic, and international cards, simplify payments, and effect conference ticket selling.

Jura is cloud-based point-of-sale and retail management software that lets retailers run their business in-store, online, and via mobile. Jura’s solution includes POS software, inventory management, E-commerce, customer loyalty, and reporting analytics.

location: Vietnam, Hồ Chí Minh, Ho Chi Minh City
description:
Founded in 2013 in Ho Chi Minh, Vietnam with a small team of developers, fram^ team has been growing the current team of >130 employees across offices in Ho Chi Minh, Da Nang, Colombo and Stockholm.

Starting from the original ecommerce specialism, fram^'s services today have spanned to provides clients with end-to-end digital solutions including Tech Consulting, Digital Consulting, Custom Software Development, Web App Development, Mobile App Development, IT Managed Services, DevOps Services, etc.

We work in flexible models of engagement across all of the services to provide clients with the ability to scale or change at any time to their needs. Four of our working formats are: Managed Services, Dedicated Team, Build-Operate-Transfer, and Fixed & Flexible Projects.

Since 2017, fram^ has become a group company publicly listed on Nasdaq First North: FRAM B. fram^ is recently proud to be ranked #212 among Europe's 1,000 fastest growing companies by the prestigious Financial Times!

location: Vietnam, Hồ Chí Minh, Ho Chi Minh City
description:
We are Verztec a leading ISO 9001:2008 Global Content Consulting Company. Verztec assists companies around the Globe to design, develop, localize and publish their global communication messages in over 100 languages across various channels.

Recently we have hired highly professional team of graphic designers, web, software and mobile application developers to be able to provide high quality, fast and long-term services to our existing and potential clients all over the World. In addition, we are highly experienced in any kinds of localization, such as software, mobile application and other types of multimedia.

Our rates for the above said products and services are more than reasonable, if compare with our competitors, but our quality and lead time will satisfied the most exacting customer due to our strict company’s policy and huge experience in cooperation with such big companies as: Google, Intel, IBM, Dell, HP, BMW, VOLVO, GM, P&G, Unilever, SONY, SAMSUNG, MasterCard and many
